text: Before it was released in May 1977, not everyone was convinced George Lucas ‘ space opera about a wizard, a farm boy and a princess would even be a hit, much less that 40 years later Star Wars would still be one of the biggest names in pop culture. Following humble and scrappy beginnings, the Star Wars films have grossed over $ 7. 5 billion, and with $ 42 - plus billion in total revenue to date, it ’ s the second most lucrative entertainment brand ever ( behind Pokémon, believe it or not ). Though the best of the films are undisputed classics, there have been ups and downs ( pretty much unavoidable after four decades ). Here we ’ ve ranked them all, including the much - hyped Solo : A Star Wars Story, now playing in theaters. Note : this list
